text: Speakes is an English surname. It may refer to: ==People== * Larry Speakes (1939–2014), an acting press spokesman for the White House under President Reagan * Stephen M. Speakes (b. 1952), a United States Army lieutenant general ==Fictional characters== * The Speakeses, a family in the soap opera Guiding Light, including Hampton (Vince Williams), Kathryn (Nia Long) and Gilly Speakes (Amelia Marshall). Category:English-language surnames Category:Surnames of English origin
title: Speakes
